content: keep crawling scarf was born out of an idea to put to use all those wonderful color coordinated mini skein sets or beautiful minis that have been collected from travels or yarn crawls i love the idea of knitting a scarf in the round and carefully cutting up the middle to create fringe on either end while this idea is a simple one i also wanted it to have some visual interest i used a mixture of stripes stockinette and garter stitch for ease and interest i hope you enjoy knitting this as much as i did creating it **yarns and yardage used ** 13 mini skeins of fingering weight yarn 92 yards/84 meters equals 20 grams listed as colors 1-12 with the 13th color used throughout listed as cc sample used destination yarn southwest collection mini skein set plus 1 additional mini skein or approximately 1196 total yards of fingering weight yarn **needles ** us size 4/3 5mm 40 /101 cm circular needle **notions ** stitch markers 1 different to mark beginning of round sharp scissors **gauge ** 20 sts x 36 rnds equals 4 /10cm in stockinette stitch after blocking **finished measurements ** approximately 12 /30 5 cm by 80 /203cm without fringe after blocking
